creator: 테일윈드
descriptionHtml:
성인 피아노 학원 강의(피아노 인강)와 고품질의 다양한 레퍼토리의 피아노 악보 등 피아노 독학에 대한 모든 것을 하나에 담았습니다. 이제 헤매지 말고 피아노스쿨링 하세요!

1. 피아노스쿨 독학
- 강의와 매칭된 전자악보 통해 강의를 들으면서 실시간으로 연주.
- 다양한 스마트 러닝 기능 제공으로 재미와 효과가 UP!
- 입문자부터 중고급자까지 준비된 클래식, 실용코드반주 과정
- 뛰어난 가성비 (월 3만원대로 전자악보, 강의, 최신 프리미엄곡 제공)

2. 전자악보서비스
- 악보 1장 구입으로 1:1 레슨 준비완료. 다양한 스마트 러닝 기능으로 1:1 레슨의 효과를 드립니다.
- 최신 가요.팝.OST 등의 전자악보를 제공합니다.
- 사용자 수준별 전자악보를 제공합니다.
- 매주 최신 피아노 전자악보를 업데이트 합니다.
- 합리적 가격 (악보 1장으로 레슨준비도 완료)

3. 리뉴얼 기념 이벤트 진행중
- 얼리버드 이벤트,
- 영창뮤직 제휴 이벤트

#리뉴얼 이벤트로 얼리버드 이벤트 진행중입니다.



※ 접근권한 안내
- 피아노스쿨 앱서비스 이용을 위해 권한 허용이 필요합니다.
- 권한을 허용하시지 않으시면 일부 기능에 제한 있어 허용하셔야만 이용이 가능합니다.

[필수적 접근 권한]
- 저장공간 : 연주 음원 및 악보 미디어의 저장함 구성과 1:1문의시 스크린샷 전송을 위해 필요합니다.

[선택적 접근 권한]
- 위치 : 주변의 장치를 검색하기 위해 필요합니다. (특정 사용자 그룹용)
----
개발자 연락처 :
서울 강서구 공항대로 227 마곡센트럴타워1차 618호 02-2668-8330
통신판매업신고번호 : 2017-서울강서-0373
descriptionShort: It is a piano school for adults to learn by connecting with a digital piano. Latest / popular piano scores and video lectures are provided.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
** 1.146버전 이후부터는 디지털 건반 연결시 자동 연결되지 않습니다. 앱을 직접 실행해주세요.
** 최신 악보 업데이트를 위해서는 최신 버전(1.146)으로 업그레이드하셔야 합니다.
- 1.152~1.153 - 컨텐츠 관리 모듈 변경 및 정기구독 추가, 미리 듣기 개선 및 버그 수정
- 1.147~1.149 버전 - 버그수정
- 1.146 버전 - 디지털 건반 연결 방식 변경 및 버그 및 안정성 개선
- 1.134~1.145 버전 - 버그 수정 및 안정성 강화
- 1.133 버전 - 디지털 피아노 출력 기기 확대 및 전자 악보 기본값이 변경되었습니다.
- 1.128~1.133버전 - 버그 수정 및 내부 기능이 개선되었습니다.
(사용자 주변의 장치를 검색하기 위한 위치 권한(선택적)이 추가되었습니다.)
- 안내 및 이용 방법은 [이용안내] 메뉴의 동영상 설명을 참고하시기 바랍니다.

title: 피아노스쿨 - 세상 편한 피아노 독학 앱

creator: 테일윈드
descriptionHtml:
The smartest way to learn piano

Piano School is the best piano tutoring app that lets anybody from kids to adults learn piano at home with systematic lessons without having to go to studios.

Start homeschooling with Piano School!

◆ Excellent features of Piano School
Try using the Smart learning feature if you are having trouble while playing.
Listen to it in advance, play it one hand at a time.
Responsive electronic sheet music will accompany you.

◆ Electronic sheet music service
- More than 1,000 sheet musics (updated every week)
- Various genres of music including classical, movie soundtrack and popular songs
- 1:1 lessons while reading sheet music
- Electronic sheet music with different genres and levels

◆ How does it work?
- Connect Piano School app with your digital piano
- Get instant feedback on your playing from the app to improve your playing skills fast
- More cost-effective compared to learning at studios

Innovative piano tutoring app for your happy playing - Piano School
Play right now!

please contact us If you have any questions regarding the use of app
Email Adress : help@pianoschool.app
descriptionShort: Learn at home! A fun and smart piano learning app – Piano School

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
** Connect with a digital piano and use various functions of responsive electronic sheet music
** To update to the latest list, touch the "Score List Update" menu.
version 1.153 ~ 1.155 : Bug fixs

- Various genres of music including classical, movie soundtrack and popular songs
- 1-1 lessons while reading the sheet music
- Digital sheet music with different genres and levels

◆ How does it work?
- Connect Piano School app with your digital piano
- Get instant feedback on your playing from the app to improve your playing skills fast
- More cost-effective compared to learning at studios (FREE ADS.)

Innovative piano tutoring app for your happy playing - Piano School
Play right now!

please contact us If you have any questions regarding the use of app
Email Adress : help@pianoschool.app
descriptionShort: Learn at home! A fun and smart piano learning app – Piano School

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
** Connect with a digital piano and use various functions of responsive electronic sheet music
** To update to the latest list, touch the "Score List Update" menu.
version 1.173 : Bug fixs

title: Piano School - Smart piano learning app

creator: Tailwind Co., Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Piano School is the Best Tutorial App for Both Kids & Adults.
No previous knowledge required to learn piano.
Practice with the Songs that You Like.
Get an Instant Performance Feedback from the App.

Play all the songs for free after watching a short ad.

◆ How to Learn Piano with Piano School
— Piano School provides more than 20 Smart Learning features.
— Utilize various Smart Running features for the difficult parts to play.

1. Listening Preview
Listen to the auto-played music of the desired part

2. One-Hand Mode
Practice with one hand at a time and then with both hands

3. Set a Section to Repeat
Select the part you want. Practice the difficult part repeatedly.

4. Keyboard Mode
Practice by pressing the keys marked on Keyboard Panel.
Touch the + icon on the top.

5. Performance

Stop wasting your time and get smart Learning & the sheet music you've been looking for with Piano School!

◆ Digital Sheet Music
— Piano School provides sheet music in 6 levels - from Beginner level to Lv.5 -
to satisfy all users with different abilities.
— More than 1,000 sheet musics (updated every week)
— Various genres of music including classical, movie soundtrack and popular songs

◆ How does it work?
— Connect your digital piano to your smart device (mobile or tablet) to utilize the Digital sheet music.
— Connected to the digital keyboard. It's automatically connected to the keyboard when open the app.

◆ Get more with PRO
— Unlimited sheet music
— No ADS (Learn with no interuption)
— Basic music theory (PDF)

Your subscription will automatically renew unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the Play Store after purchase.

Innovative piano tutoring app for your happy playing —Piano School
Play right now!

please contact us If you have any questions regarding the use of app
Email Adress : help@pianoschool.app
